channel.title: - F2P Dev Project Thread -
channel.description:
[center][i]Doing something basic for now, I'm just using this thread mainly to keep up with my goals and whatnot; you may say F2P servers are easy to make - but I'm going to the full extent. Donator(Member) system, although it can't be that hard to me it is. I'm doing this for further experience and I seen a lot of people begging for a release like this, I seen a F2P release with a bunch of errors and a shitload of kids crying over it. UPDATE: Releasing the basic version of F2P Dev. One without the members' benefits (donor system), just releasing the basic version. Going to host/sell the REAL member'd version with quests. This development went fast, and is already done. Lawl. Took a little over a day.. Wow.
Base: 317/Delta (Don't flame, couldn't find a PI base!) Start Date: 7/24/11 (My birthday too!) Expected Release Date: 8/1/11[/i]
[b]-- GOALS --[/b] Green - Complete Yellow - Working On Red - Not Started Black - NOT doing. - Full Member (Donator) system - [u]Maybe[/u] 1-2 Quests (Thinking Demon Slayer/Rune Mysteries to get people based off (; ) - F2P members given access to the usual; Draynor, Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, etc. - F2P pk'ing items (Might let Gmaul/Obby Mauls slide due to Pures benefit!) - Demon Slayer quest (It'll probably be something custom/shortened. Or a Scavenger hunt with bosses for the keys to unlock the case to Silverlight, then kill the demon eh?) - Rune Mysteries - Full Magic Book system (WITHOUT VENG! Basic Spells!) - Even added Autocast to F2P Staves. - Members' benefits (More Item privileged, access to more skills, access to Veng, etc) Big goals? Got to reach for the sky to achieve them. <3 [/code]
[b]-- Progress Code --[/b] [code] - Fixed Teleports (Requires Runes/Deletes Runes) - Gates that lead out of F2P areas requires playerRights == 4 (Member/Donator) - Added a few F2P shops. This is looking GREAT.<3 [/code]
[b]-- Media --[/b] [code] None. [/code] [/center]
PLEASE POST SUGGESTIONS ON WHAT I CAN DO TO MAKE THIS A BETTER F2P SERVER!

item.title: - F2P Dev Project Thread -
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Oh.

Read full topic

item.title: - F2P Dev Project Thread -
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Mendorphins:

I thought this was great until I read “it took you little under a day to make…”.

Lolol. Noo.
Under a day to make the basic version, ;p The one I simply released, that everyone was begging for.

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:10, topic:406082”]you should do all f2p quests as they arent that hard
& no costum quests, id rather play a server with no quests at all then
also dont add costums, access to member areas or items & tweak the combat a bit

and your good to go, good luck[/quote]
Nope, it’s going to be the full quests. No bullshit.

Read full topic

item.title: - F2P Dev Project Thread -
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

[center][i]Doing something basic for now, I’m just using this thread mainly to keep up with my goals and whatnot; you may say F2P servers are easy to make - but I’m going to the full extent. Donator(Member) system, although it can’t be that hard to me it is. I’m doing this for further experience and I seen a lot of people begging for a release like this, I seen a F2P release with a bunch of errors and a shitload of kids crying over it.
UPDATE: Releasing the basic version of F2P Dev. One without the members’ benefits (donor system), just releasing the basic version. Going to host/sell the REAL member’d version with quests. This development went fast, and is already done. Lawl. Took a little over a day… Wow.

Base: 317/Delta (Don’t flame, couldn’t find a PI base!)
Start Date: 7/24/11 (My birthday too!)
Expected Release Date: 8/1/11[/i]

– GOALS –
Green - Complete
Yellow - Working On
Red - Not Started
Black - NOT doing.

  • Full Member (Donator) system
  • Maybe 1-2 Quests (Thinking Demon Slayer/Rune Mysteries to get people based off (; )
  • F2P members given access to the usual; Draynor, Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, etc.
  • F2P pk’ing items (Might let Gmaul/Obby Mauls slide due to Pures benefit!)
  • Demon Slayer quest (It’ll probably be something custom/shortened. Or a Scavenger hunt with bosses for the keys to unlock the case to Silverlight, then kill the demon eh?)
  • Rune Mysteries
  • Full Magic Book system (WITHOUT VENG! Basic Spells!) - Even added Autocast to F2P Staves.
  • Members’ benefits (More Item privileged, access to more skills, access to Veng, etc)
    Big goals? Got to reach for the sky to achieve them. <3 [/code]

– Progress Code –

- Fixed Teleports (Requires Runes/Deletes Runes)
- Gates that lead out of F2P areas requires playerRights == 4 (Member/Donator)
- Added a few F2P shops.
This is looking GREAT.<3

– Media –

None.

[/center]

PLEASE POST SUGGESTIONS ON WHAT I CAN DO TO MAKE THIS A BETTER F2P SERVER!

Read full topic
